title: Speed up your RNN with Sequence Bucketing
description: Update: Following the suggestion by @adityaecdrid and @jackwei (thanks!) I have added a comparison between different implementations of sequence bucketing including the one used in @authmans great kernel and changed the sequence bucketing method used as a result of this.
description_lemmatized: update following suggestion adityaecdrid jackwei thanks added comparison different implementation sequence bucketing including one used authmans great kernel changed sequence bucketing method used result
